comments.purpose: This file is intentionally a minimal override (delta) example; Claude Code merges it on top of `.claude/settings.json`, so it should only contain keys you want to change locally.
comments.reference: For the full production settings baseline, see `.claude/settings.json`. Copy that file to `.claude/settings.local.json` only if you need a full local fork (recommended: keep it small to reduce drift).
comments.models: Optional: Tool Search requires Sonnet/Opus (Haiku disables tool_reference blocks). Put this in settings.local.json to keep repo defaults unchanged.
comments.hooks: Enable skill injection hook for automatic skill loading when Task tool is used
comments.windows_users: Windows users should use .claude/hooks/skill-injection-hook.ps1 instead of .sh
